alert.note: Alert for Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 27 at 3:29AM MDT until April 28 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Southern Front Range Foothills. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous with slush and snow covered roads and limited visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet
